scripts.validate-env: node -e "require('dotenv').config(); console.log('Validating environment...'); const key = process.env.VITE_CLERK_PUBLISHABLE_KEY; if (!key) { console.error('❌ VITE_CLERK_PUBLISHABLE_KEY is not set'); process.exit(1); } const isProduction = key.startsWith('pk_live_'); console.log('✅ Clerk key found:', isProduction ? 'Production (pk_live_)' : 'Development (pk_test_)'); console.log('✅ Backend URL:', process.env.VITE_BACKEND_URL || 'Not set'); console.log('Environment validation complete!');"
